keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Lawyers for the Armenian Church said Tuesday that they had filed a lawsuit with Turkey’s highest court seeking a return of the church’s headquarters, seized by the Ottomans in 1915.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Turkey: Armenian Church Seeks Headquarters’ Return
headline.main: Turkey: Armenian Church Seeks Headquarters’ Return

snippet: Lawyers for the Armenian Church said Tuesday that they had filed a lawsuit with Turkey’s highest court seeking a return of the church’s headquarters, seized by the Ottomans in 1915.
abstract: Armenian Church files lawsuit in Constitutional Court of Turkey, demanding return of its headquarters, which was taken as part of 1915 genocide.
